favourite.article: There's no one lovelier than our Lord Jesus — but sometimes we'd get so distracted by the world, that we forget to tell Him that. Today I was reminded once again how much I need to go back to Him day after day. Our God is the only worthy one. Lord Jesus, You're lovely!
Reminding us to love Him only. Amen.
Thank You dear Lord love You, I give my life to You!!!
Lord, may this be our prayer: May all my days be Yours, Lord, my heart be given to love You, to treasure and to serve You by Your sufficient grace.
Which number is this hymn in Russian?
I enjoy singing this song to the Lord this morning. When I behold You Jesus, You draw my heart completely I cannot turn away Lord I rest in Your embrace. May we just rest in His embrace.
It is true that Christ Jesus is the most gorgeous One!!! Give the glory just for Him!!!

Lord Jesus, I give this coming lunar New Year to You. May all my days be Yours Lord. I do not account of myself to have laid hold; but one thing I do: Forgetting the things which are behind and stretching forward to the things which are before, I pursue toward the goal for the prize to which God in Christ Jesus has called me upward. Lord I love You, really !
Cause me to give myself to You Lord... for You alone are worthy.
So sweet!

Nothing compares to our dear lovely Lord.... Doesn't even come close. He just Is! May we just know, experience in full, and enjoy all His riches. He's so wonderful. I just love Him. Songs like this always soften my heart toward Him and usher me into my mingled spirit bringing me into such sweet fellowship with Him. Lord I just love You... may all my days be Yours, Lord... I just give my heart to love You, Lord... to treasure and serve You by Your sufficient grace.
Wow, Lord Jesus I love You.
This song just warmed my heart this morning. It was such a tender way to take in the Lord as my supply. It cherished and nourished me at the same time. Praise the Lord.
Wow...so sweet. I just rest in Your sweet embrace dear Lord.

My husband and I sang this hymn in our wedding meeting (1998) as our consecration before the Lord. This really preserves us in our service to the Lord and to the church because this hymn reminds us always that nothing on earth compares to Him, and we should not desire anything other than Him. In our eleven years of marriage life this has been our longing and prayer "May all our days be Yours Lord, our heart be given to love you, to treasure and to serve You, by Your sufficient grace". What a blessing to serve the Lord...What a glorious church life we have when we abide in Him!!!

I love this song. The Lord is so precious to me, and I think this is a really good way to show Him how precious He is. Anytime I want to just turn to Him, this is the song that comes to my mind. I give myself to You Lord!
Wonderful!

This hymn touches me very much. These few days a sister came to visit me to ask me whether I know about this hymn. That reminded me again, this hymn touched me before. When she went back home, I found this song here, sang it again... tears drop. Oh Lord Jesus You're lovely. When I behold You Jesus, You draw my heart completely. I cannot turn away Lord, I rest in Your embrace; And time is gone there's only Your holy, matchless presence Abiding in You, gazing Upon Your glorious face. Look at myself is so full of weakness. I can't do anything, oh Lord. May all my days be Yours, Lord, My heart be given to love You, to treasure and to serve You by Your sufficient grace. Lord I need You!
Lord, only You and Your church are worthy for me to waste upon.
Lord, I love You. You're worthy to be loved.

When I sing this song, my heart melts for my Beloved. Oh Lord, how sweet You are! You are beyond compare! How could I ever want more than You. Unveil my eyes to see You more every day. Draw my heart...draw my entire being to seek You more and more each day. I truly want to desire nothing and no one more than You. Have mercy on me.
This is my most favourite hymn. It reminds me to drop everything and to just love Him with my best love "I give my life to You, Lord, For only You are worthy!!"
The Lord's beauty is incomparable...undefinable. There's no one like Him in His humanity.

The line of thought of this hymn flows so well, speaks of our christian experience of our appreciation towards the Lord and our being drawn by Him, and this issues in our consecration to our precious Lord. May the third stanza of this hymn be our prayer to the Lord. Saints, enjoy!

This hymn simply draws my heart toward the Lord.. Abiding in You, Lord, enjoying your matchless presence..
May all my days be Yours, Lord..
It's not fair to say nothing while gaining something precious. I love this song because I love my Lord and my fellow brothers and sisters.
This hymn is so soothing and helps to draw me back to the Lord Himself. Praise the Lord for this hymn.
Praise the Lord! I like this song because it is so lovely!!!!!!!!!!!!
I had a beautiful dream today and in my dream I heard this beautiful hymn, which reminds me to say to Him one more time what has always been in my mind, You are lovely, Lord.

This song always touches me in such a deep and real way. When I'm praising the Lord, and this hymn speaks exactly what I want to say to the Lord. I feel like He's the most wonderful and the most high God, no one can compare to Him — you know what I mean?
